column4: hi all, I am using ubuntu 10.04, grub is grub 2 but why I type in command "grub --version" in terminal,it shows that the version is 0.97,what is the problem here ?
bondv6 : no, with "update-grub" command it printouts "do you want to create menu.lst" ?
may be it is grub version and not ubuntu lucid version?
just be happy with grub - you would have seen my plight with grub2 here now.
